mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe(subscribeNo, subscribeStartDate, targetedMemberNo, memberNo) VALUES(SEQ_SUBSCRIBE_subscribeNo.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, (SELECT memberNo FROM member WHERE id=#{id}), (SELECT memberNo FROM member WHERE id=#{loginedId}))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subscribe WHERE targetedMemberNo = (SELECT memberNo FROM member WHERE id=#{id}) AND memberNo = (SELECT memberNo FROM member WHERE id=#{loginedId})
